Description: Restricts IAM instance profiles that can be applied to instances
Restircts the KMS keys that can be used for encrypting storage
Notes: This does NOT enfiorce encryption, it only limits the KMS keys that can be used.
AWS Classic will not be availble.

Description: Restricts subnets available to the specified types, i.e Public or Private
Notes: Note this is an Either/Or selection.

Description: Restricts the instance types available for RDS database instances
Requires RDS to be deployed in multiple AZ's for resilience
